explanations elsewhere feed

I put a lot of code up on Github, but most of it is simple projects I used to explore new ideas. My most popular project is a Solarized theme for Limechat. I also created a Mukluk theme for the Atom text editor and a similar theme for the “fish” shell.

I only tweet a few times each week, but I try to make them worth reading. This is my most popular tweet, for what that’s worth. I am actually most proud of this tweet that introduced Michael Jackson to the React Router that Ryan Florence had started.

I am beginning to blog on my tumblr blog again. I have dedicated it to my non-programming writings.

I am on linkedin, but I tend to update it only when I switch jobs.

I have a Google plus account, but I use it primarily to play Ingress.
